meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hasty.
meanings.sent1: Her hastinesses in decision-making often led to mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The hastinesses of his actions caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent3: Despite her hastinesses, she always managed to get things done on time.
meanings.sent4: The hastinesses of the squirrel gathering nuts amazed onlookers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher warned the students about the dangers of hastinesses in their work.

meanings.definition: Acting with excessive speed or urgency.
meanings.sent1: The hastinesses response to the emergency saved lives.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her hastinesses decision to quit without thinking it through.
meanings.sent3: The hastinesses rabbit almost tripped over its own feet in its rush.
meanings.sent4: His hastinesses approach to the project left many details overlooked.
meanings.sent5: The hastinesses wind blew the leaves off the trees in a whirlwind.
